abstract: “America’s Got Talent” continued to deliver in the ratings for NBC, earning Wednesday’s largest audience with 12 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates. That tally represented NBC’s best showing in the time period on a Wednesday since early January, excluding Olympic coverage, lifting the network to an easy victory in the night’s ratings overall.

lead_paragraph: “America’s Got Talent” continued to deliver in the ratings for NBC, earning Wednesday’s largest audience with 12 million viewers from 8 to 10 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates. That tally represented NBC’s best showing in the time period on a Wednesday since early January, excluding Olympic coverage, lifting the network to an easy victory in the night’s ratings over all.

headline.main: Ratings: ‘America’s Got Talent’ Tops Wednesday’s Ratings
